line: "That's enough. You're slightly better than I expected. Maybe those echoes are worth something after all."
The woman vanishes in a blink of an eye, only leaving the mangled bodies behind.
Your companions stay on high alert for a moment, but seeing that the danger is really gone they lower their weapons.

speaker: Princess
line: "Well there is something strange about our bodies. Maybe that's the correct term."
The maid calls out to me.

speaker: I
line: "What reason do I have to lie?"

speaker: Maid
line: "That's what I'd like to find out, too."

speaker: Maid
line: "Well, she's gone, so I suppose the only way forward is through this... portal?"

speaker: Maid
line: "I never actually managed to take a good look at this room, the security here was too dense for me."

speaker: Maid
line: "I thought that the mansion lord was in here. Well he probably was here before she came."

speaker: Maid
line: "Now he's somewhere in... there, I guess."
The maid vaguely gestures towards the mangled bodies.
